title: PHOS OUT ULTRA 2 IN 1
long_description: PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 is a dual-action treatment that eliminates phosphates and clarifies pool water in a single application. When used weekly, PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 will continuously eliminate phosphates and keep water crystal clear. PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 is not affected by chlorine and works in any pH condition. It will not alter the water’s pH level.
short_description: BENEFITS Eliminates phosphates Clarifies pool water FORMAT 1 L

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Add PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 to pool water directly in front of the water return jet.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 must be added with the filter running. Add PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 according to the application method. Wait 60 minutes before using the pool. Keep filter running for 8 hours. Backwash filter if it reaches the maximum recommended pressure, or rinse the cartridges. If needed, vacuum the bottom of the pool.

dosage.specifications: For initial phosphate treatment: Add 60 mL of PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water to treat phosphate levels between 250 and 1,000 ppb. For weekly preventive treatment: Add 25 mL of PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water. Use weekly for crystal-clear pool water all season long. For cloudy water treatment: Add 125 mL of PHOS OUT ULTRA TM 2 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
